ygData.subject: RE: Another Feign Death post.
ygData.msgSnippet: To see exactly how the nerf of FD messed over Monks, visit the monk onelist page and sift the archives from this weekend. My wife was part of the 290+ PvP
ygData.messageBody:
To see exactly how the nerf of FD messed over Monks, visit the monk onelist
page and sift the archives from this weekend.
My wife was part of the 290+ PvP monks that caused Verant to shut off access
to the West Freeport zone and lock out the PoD near the Pier. Every monk
present sent in a /Petition about the FD nerf and wanting it changed back.
The admins probably went nuts seeing 290 /petitions light up the screens all
at once! Then Smedley came on and said they would look at FD again. The
gathering also crashed the zone once. Heh, just like a GM event, only the
Players had control. There were also close to 3000 people on Fennin Ro that
night as well. This may have come close to server capasity, and sent a
"WTF?" thought through quite a few heads.

This reminds me. If you really want to get Verant's attention for SK nerfs
and issues, people from all servers need to meet at one server like the
monks did. That got Verant's attention better than one person petitioning or
/feedback over and over because it involved realtime resources (the 290
/petitions, and crashing the zone) that caused alot of headaches for the
Verant staff. Send them an email with alot of signitures and they notice it
and pass it up. Crash the zone and alarms go off all the way to the top.
Every manager, team lead, and VP will want to know everything about the
incident, and will want it fixed as fast as possible. Their jobs depend on
it. You want a change and to have Verant look at it now? Get organized, and
do it on Fennin Ro. Fennin Ro is their biggest server and will give them the
biggest headache.

Ok, I will get off my soap box now.

Formerly
--
Cronik Khaos <Dark Omen>
16th Season TSK
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
Bertoxxulous


-----Original Message-----
From: Tony Donatelli [mailto:donatea@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 5:12 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Another Feign Death post.


From: "Tony Donatelli" <donatea@...>

> did you actually use feign before the patch?
>
> you couldn't possibly have - and believe that this new fd system is "more"
> predictable...or even predictable at all (compared to the previous
system).
> i for one KNOW how fd worked before (the verant posted is complete bs, a
> blatant lie) and i know how it works now.

Of course I used FD before the patch. I pull better than most monks, and I'm
just an SK. I was trained by a monk (THE premiere monk on Fennin) and I know
how to feign, believe me. My point was not whether the new FD was better or
worse, I refuse to go down that road. I'm telling you how it is NOW, after
the fact. You can use that information or you can bitch and moan. I was
trying to give you some advice on how the new FD is best used, even in its
"nerfed" state, and you insult me. I guess I'll just go back to lurking on
the list, sorry to post.

Dravith

-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
